ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They ask you about the Hour: 'When will it come?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They ask you: "When will the Hour be? When is its time fixed?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They ask you about the Hour: “When will it be?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), they ask you, "When will the Hour of Doom come?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They (the disbelievers) ask you regarding the Last Day, as to when is its appointed time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They ask you about the Hour when will be its appointed time
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They ask you about the hour, when it will come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They will question thee concerning the Hour, when it shall berth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They ask thee of the Hour: when will it come to port?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will ask you [Prophet] about the Hour, saying, "When it will come to pass?",
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They question thee of the Hour:'when will its arrival be?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They ask you concerning the Hour, “When will it set in,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They ask thee about the Hour,-'When will be its appointed time?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They ask you (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) about the Hour, - when will be its appointed time?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They will question you about the Hour: 'When shall it be'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They ask you about the Hour, “When will it take place?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:42] They, that is, the disbelievers of Mecca, will ask you about the Hour: when will it set in?, when will it come to pass and when will it begin?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They ask thee) the disbelievers of Mecca ask you, Muhammad, (of the Hour) about the advent of the Hour: (when will it come to port?) When is it going to happen? Because they disbelieved in it.
